title: Justin Bieber keeps his cool as he leaves the Montage hotel decked out in Drew House
text:
He launched his fashion line Drew House less than a year ago.

And Justin Bieber was decked out in his own threads while out in Beverly Hills on Wednesday.

The singer, 25, was spotted leaving the Montage hotel rocking in a Drew House T-shirt with lilac shorts.

His own best advert! Justin Bieber was decked out head-to-toe in his own threads while out in Beverly Hills on Wednesday

The only articles of clothing wavering from his all Drew House look were his sky blue sneakers and black cap.

At one point, the hit-maker appeared deep in though as he took a call while strolling across the driveway.

Justin launched his clothing line Drew House to major success in January 2019, with the collection selling out just hours after it's debut.

The name of the collection is inspired by none other than Justin himself, with his middle name being Drew.

On the line: The singer appeared deep in thought while taking a call outside the building

Whether he's sporting the collection himself or posting about it on Instagram, Justin has really been his line's best advert.

On top of his fashion interests, the singer has also been using his platform to promote his upcoming music.

On Sunday, Justin promised fans he would release a new album by Christmas if his Instagram post obtained 20 million likes.

Who's with him? On Sunday, Justin promised fans he would release a new album by Christmas if his Instagram post obtained 20 million likes

'If this gets 20 million likes Justin Bieber will release an album before Christmas,' the singer wrote in the post.

It looks like the singer still as a ways to go, with a little over 11 million people liking the post by Wednesday.

The project would be the first time Justin has released an album in four years, after the release of 2015's Purpose.
